Will antivirus software like Avast and Kaspersky never flag this software as a virus or malware?

No, Avast and Kaspersky may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program), which are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
